descriptionHtml:
This is my first Mod. It is a Follower based on Sandaniks Morannon.

What i have done is:

- Renaming her
- Relocate her to the inner Sanctum of Dibella in Markarth.
- Giving her a little Outfit

The Robe can be crafted at the Tanning Rack. The jewelry can be crafted in future releases.

Requirements:
Ofcourse the original Morannon Requirements (Apachii Skyhair)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extension[/url] (only for her robe)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] (Looks not good with other Body´s)
All other should be included.

To have the same look you need:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D51602&pUp=1]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]

Installation:
Simply put the ESP and the Texture and Meshes Folder in your Data Folder

or

- Use Mod Organizer for installing
- Mark the "Dibella the Goddess of Beauty" Folder of the Files as Data Folder.
- If MO say "looks good" you are right.

Credits:
Sandraniks for her beautfull Follower [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19638/?]Morannon[/url]
Chronotrigger77 for the transparent Nocturnal from his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT[/url] Mod
Serverus616 for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35880/?]SCJewelry[/url]
lautasantenni für the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361/?]Expanded Jewelry[/url]
Apachii for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D10168&pUp=1]SkyHair[/url]
Caliente for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio[/url]

Future Plans:
Add HighHeels
Unlock her after the Hearth of Dibella Quest
author: Mortiferus85

files.name: Dibella the Goddess of Beauty
files.changelogHtml:
Increased Levelcap to 1000
Jewelry is now craftable at the Smithingforge
